channel.title: Can't get server to allow other people on. Plz help
channel.description:
ya like it says i can get on my server using local host but nobody can get on usin my no-ip. Ive done portforwarded and everything else but no1 can join.
any help will be appreciated.

item.title: Can't get server to allow other people on. Plz help
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

you probably didnt port foward right. go back and check again and see if you did anything wrong
